mapper.select: select track_id from customer_network where id = #{id}
select * from customer_network where id =#{id} FOR UPDATE
select id,track_id,overdue_time,last_follow_name FROM customer_network where status = 0 and issue = 1
select id,overdue_time from customer_network where status in(10,6) and issue = 1
select track_id from deal_order where id = #{id}
mapper.update: update deal_order set order_state = 1,conduct = #{conduct},contract_no = #{contractNo},pay = #{pay},cost = #{cost},deal_time = #{dealTime},recording_name = #{recordingName} where id = #{id}
update customer_network set status = #{status},last_follow_name = #{lastFollowName} where id = #{id}
update customer_network set track_id = #{trackId} where id = #{id}

update customer_network set last_follow_name = #{firstFollowName},first_follow_name = #{firstFollowName},issue = 1,status = #{status},leader_name = #{leaderName}, receiving_time = sysdate(),branch = #{branch} where id = #{id}

corporate_name = #{corporateName},

where id = #{id}
